description: Retrieves a list of source repositories in a project.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the source repository.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the source repository.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the repository, if any.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time the source repository was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The time the source repository was created, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token returned from a call to this API to indicate the next batch of results to return, if any.
